group "elementsAndRefinementsGroup"
Namespace:
http://purl.org/dc/terms/
Content:
1 element
Defined:
globally in dcterms.xsd; see XML source
Includes:
definition of 1 element
Used:
at 2 locations
Complex Content Model
dc:any*
Content Model Elements (1):
dc:any
Known Usage Locations
  • In definitions of global complexTypes (2):
    citationType, elementOrRefinementContainer
Annotation
This group is included as a convenience for schema authors who need to refer to all the DC elements and element refinements in the http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/ and http://purl.org/dc/terms namespaces. N.B. Refinements available via substitution groups.
XML Source (w/o annotations (1); see within schema source)
<xs:group name="elementsAndRefinementsGroup">
<xs:sequence>
<xs:choice maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0">
<xs:element ref="dc:any"/>
</xs:choice>
</xs:sequence>
</xs:group>
Content Element Detail (all declarations; defined within this component only; 1/1)
dc:any
Type:
dc:SimpleLiteral, mixed content
Abstract:
(may not be used directly in instance XML documents)
Subst.Gr:
may be substituted with 48 elements
XML Source (see within schema source)
<xs:element ref="dc:any"/>
